name: Frayliens
description:
You are an astronaut who crashed in a strange planet with weird-red soil and weirder-looking animals! They are coming to attack you! Ensure your survival by killing them! How many waves can you survive?

Controls

Move: Arrow Keys or WASD

Shoot: Mouse (Left: Blue Laser, Right: Green Laser)

Objective

Survive as many waves as you can. Try to score the highest points.

Notes

1. The green aliens can be killed only by green/special lasers and the blue aliens can only be killed by blue/special lasers.

2. Keep a sharp eye for the pickups.

3. Shield kills them too!

4. Don't fall in the middle of a herd. You'll be DEAD like you've never died before!

5. Player upgrades over time.
